role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Chromium on Linux or Google Chrome on Windows/macOS
role_description_full_overview: [Google Chrome](https://www.google.com/chrome/) is a cross-platform web browser developed by Google. It was first released in 2008 for Microsoft Windows, and was later ported to Linux, macOS, iOS, and Android where it is the default browser built into the OS.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Chromium on Linux or Google Chrome on Windows/macOS.
